summary: SImple mod that makes 2 death hound collars smeltable into 1 ebony ingot.  There is also a version for using 3 collars instead of 2.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Collars into Ebony Ingots - by EliteKhajiit[/b]

A sImple mod that makes 2 death hound collars smeltable into 1 ebony ingot. There is also a version for using 3 collars instead of 2. Not intended to be a cheat, just there to give the player another way to make ebony, and to do something interesting with those collars. Collars are now classified as an ore for better organization. Smelting collars requires the Ebony Smithing perk.

Check out another mod of mine for smelting [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56491/?]dwemer clutter into dwarven ingots[/url].

[i]*Checked with TES5Edit*[/i]

----------------------------

[i]Installation[/i]

Just download and install with your mod manager. Make sure to activate it.

For a manual install, extract into your skyrim\data folder.


[i]To Uninstall[/i]

Simply deactivate the mod. If you are paranoid, leave all of you collars in a container and travel to a different cell before deactivating.


[i]Compatibility[/i]

Compatible with anything. Place it [i]after[/i] any crafting mods in your load order just to be sure.


----------------------------

[i]Other mods of mine[/i]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56490/?]Quieter Bears
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56985/?]Convenient Horses - Only Short Whistles[/url]
author: EliteKhajiit
